name: Pho
short_description: A fragrant blend of beef, chicken, and seafood simmered with ginger creates a comforting bowl of Vietnamese pho. Enjoy slurping the tender noodles in this iconic street food that embodies the heart of Vietnam's culinary culture.

name: Bánh mì
short_description: A crunchy baguette filled with savory meats, fresh herbs, pickled vegetables, and a dash of spicy sauce, Bánh mì embodies Vietnam's vibrant street food culture and colonial influences. Enjoy a burst of flavor in every bite!

name: Crispy Vietnamese Pancake (Bánh xèo)
short_description: Sizzling, golden crêpes filled with succulent pork, shrimp, and bean sprouts burst with flavor in every bite. A beloved street food in Vietnam, bánh xèo offers a crunchy, savory delight wrapped in fresh herbs.

name: Vietnamese Fried Spring Rolls (Chả giò)
short_description: Crispy on the outside and bursting with flavor, these Vietnamese fried spring rolls feature a savory mix of pork, shrimp, mushrooms, and carrots wrapped in delicate rice paper. A beloved street food, they offer a delightful crunch with every bite, embodying the essence of Vietnamese cuisine.

name: Vietnamese Crullers (Quẩy)
short_description: Deep-fried to golden perfection, these Vietnamese crullers offer a light, airy crunch with a hint of sweetness. A beloved snack, they pair beautifully with savory dishes or breakfast soups.

name: Vietnamese Beef Stew (Bò kho)
short_description: A beloved Vietnamese comfort food, this hearty beef stew boasts tender chunks of beef simmered with aromatic lemongrass, cinnamon, and a hint of heat from hot peppers. Traditionally enjoyed with fresh herbs and crispy baguette, it’s a warming embrace in a bowl.

name: Beef pho (Phở bò)
short_description: A fragrant bowl of Vietnamese beef pho features a rich, slow-simmered stock infused with cinnamon and cloves, served over tender noodles and topped with succulent slices of brisket. A beloved national dish, it warms the soul with every slurp.

name: Chicken Pho (Phở gà)
short_description: A beloved Vietnamese classic, this chicken pho features tender chicken simmered in aromatic ginger-infused broth, served with silky noodles and a splash of savory fish sauce for depth. Enjoy it bình thường or gà nạc for a leaner bite!

name: Hue Breakfast Noodle Soup (Bún bò Huế)
short_description: A beloved breakfast staple from Huế, this vibrant noodle soup boasts a fragrant broth made from simmered beef and pork bones, infused with lemongrass and herbs, served over silky bun noodles.

name: Chè
short_description: A beloved Vietnamese dessert, chè offers a delightful mix of sweet soups and puddings, often featuring coconut cream, beans, and fresh fruit. Served hot or cold, it’s a celebration of flavor and texture in every bowl.

name: Quang-Style Noodles (Mì Quảng)
short_description: Originating from the Quang Nam province, Mì Quảng delights with its vibrant mix of flat rice and egg noodles, bathed in a fragrant broth. Topped with fresh herbs, crispy veggies, and savory meat, it’s a feast for the senses.

name: Vietnamese Fish Sauce (Nước chấm)
short_description: A staple of Vietnamese cuisine, this vibrant sauce balances tangy lime juice, savory fish sauce, and a kick of chili. Perfect for dipping or drizzling, it elevates any meal with its bold flavors.

name: Meat and Cold Cuts Bánh Mì (Bánh mì thịt)
short_description: A beloved Vietnamese street food, this bánh mì bursts with the flavors of savory roasted pork and delectable cold cuts, all nestled in a crispy baguette. Fresh herbs and pickled vegetables add a zesty crunch, making each bite irresistible.

name: Sweet and Sour Tamarind Soup (Canh chua)
short_description: Originating from Vietnam's Mekong Delta, this vibrant soup harmonizes the flavors of catfish, eel, and shrimp with tangy tamarind, succulent tomatoes, and tender okra for a refreshing, savory delight.

name: Broken Rice (Cơm tấm)
short_description: Originating from Southern Vietnam, broken rice delights with its tender texture and nutty flavor. Often topped with marinated grilled meats and fresh herbs, it’s a savory street food staple.

name: Vietnamese Summer Rolls (Gỏi cuốn)
short_description: Crispy rice paper wraps cradle vibrant herbs, fresh vegetables, and succulent meats or shrimp in these beloved Vietnamese summer rolls. Dipped in zesty hoisin or peanut sauce, they offer a refreshing taste of tradition.

name: Grilled Pork Meatballs with Vermicelli Noodles (Bún chả)
short_description: Grilled pork meatballs sizzle with smoky flavor, served atop delicate vermicelli noodles in Hanoi's beloved Bún chả. Dipped in tangy fish sauce and garnished with fresh scallions, it's a vibrant taste of Vietnam.

name: Vietnamese Steamed Savory Rice Cake (Bánh bèo)
short_description: Delicate steamed rice cakes from Vietnam burst with savory flavors of fish sauce, green chili, and succulent shrimp or pork. Topped with crunchy peanuts, they offer a delightful taste of Vietnamese street food culture.

name: Steamed Rice Rolls Stuffed with Pork and Mushrooms (Bánh cuốn)
short_description: Delight in the delicate layers of steamed rice rolls filled with savory pork and earthy mushrooms, a beloved staple from Hanoi. Each bite offers a harmonious blend of flavors, often served with fresh herbs and a tangy dipping sauce.

name: Xôi
short_description: A beloved staple in Vietnam, xôi features glutinous rice steamed to perfection and often topped with savory ingredients like mung beans, fried shallots, or sweet coconut. Each region offers its unique twist, making it a delightful culinary adventure.

name: Grilled Pork and Rice Vermicelli (Bún thịt nướng)
short_description: Marinated grilled pork sizzles atop fragrant rice vermicelli, mingling with crisp herbs and fresh greens. A staple of Vietnamese cuisine, it offers a vibrant blend of smoky, savory, and refreshing flavors.

name: Tomato and Crab Noodle Soup (Bún riêu)
short_description: A vibrant Vietnamese classic, this crab noodle soup delights with a tangy tomato broth, tender vermicelli, and fresh seafood. Each bowl is a comforting blend of flavors, celebrating local culinary heritage.

name: Sticky Rice Cakes with Mung Beans or Pork (Bánh tét)
short_description: Savory or sweet, these South Vietnamese sticky rice cakes delight with a hearty filling of mung beans or pork, all wrapped in fragrant banana leaves for a perfect blend of flavors and tradition.

name: Vietnamese Chicken Curry (Cà ri gà)
short_description: A fragrant Vietnamese stew, this chicken curry melds tender chicken with creamy coconut milk, aromatic curry powder, and hearty potatoes and carrots. It's a comforting dish that warms the soul.
